criteria: Accuracy in Identifying Trusted Adults at Home

descriptions: The student cannot identify any trusted adults at home.
The student identifies one adult at home but is unsure or provides an inaccurate reason.
The student identifies one trusted adult at home and provides a basic reason why.
The student identifies two trusted adults at home and provides reasons that show a general understanding of trust.
The student accurately identifies multiple trusted adults at home, providing clear and thoughtful reasons based on their characteristics and actions.
The student comprehensively identifies multiple trusted adults at home, providing insightful and detailed reasons, demonstrating a deep understanding of trust and support systems.
